trans-unit.source: During the relative course of an animation, a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> instance specifies the precise timing when a particular key frame should take place.
trans-unit.target: 在動畫的相對過程期間，<see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> 執行個體 (Instance) 會指定發生特定主要畫面格的精確時間。

trans-unit.source: Each key frame's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime> specifies when that key frame ends.
trans-unit.target: 每個主要畫面格的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime>指定該索引鍵的畫面格的結束時。

trans-unit.source: It does not specify how long the key time plays.
trans-unit.target: 其並未指定多久的 key time 播放。

trans-unit.source: The amount of time a key frame plays is determined by when the key frame ends, when the previous key frame ended, and the animation's duration.
trans-unit.target: 主要畫面格的播放時間量取決於主要畫面格的結束時間、前一個主要畫面格的結束時間，以及動畫的持續期間。

trans-unit.source: See [Key-Frame Animations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/key-frame-animations-overview.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[主要畫面格動畫概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/key-frame-animations-overview.md)如需詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime> may be expressed in several different formats, including a numeric time value, as a percentage, or as one of the special sentinel values <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.Uniform%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.Paced%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime>可能會有多種不同的格式，包括數值的時間值，以百分比表示，或做為其中一個特殊 sentinel 值的方式來表示<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.Uniform%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.Paced%2A>。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: \<*object* *property*="[*days*.]*hours*:*minutes*:*seconds*[.*fractionalSeconds*]"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*object* *property*="[*days*.]*hours*:*minutes*:*seconds*[.*fractionalSeconds*]"/>

trans-unit.source: \- or -
\<*object* *property*="[*days*.]*hours*:*minutes*"/>
\- or -
\<*object* *property*="*pctValue*%"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*object* *property*="*pctValue*%"/>

trans-unit.source: \- or -
\<*object* *property*="<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.Uniform%2A>"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*object* *property*="<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.Uniform%2A>"/>

trans-unit.source: \- or -
\<*object* *property*="<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.Paced%2A>"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*object* *property*="<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.Paced%2A>"/>

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *days*
An integer value greater than or equal to 0 that specifies the number of days spanned by this <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime>.
trans-unit.target: 整數值大於或等於 0，指定由此跨裝置填滿的天數<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.TimeSpan%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.TimeSpan%2A> 屬性 (Property)。

trans-unit.source: *hours*
trans-unit.target: *小時*

trans-unit.source: An integer value between 0 and 23 that specifies the number of hours spanned by this <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime>.
trans-unit.target: 指定由此跨裝置填滿的時數的整數值介於 0 到 23 之間<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.TimeSpan%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.TimeSpan%2A> 屬性 (Property)。

trans-unit.source: *minutes*
trans-unit.target: *分鐘*

trans-unit.source: An integer value between 0 and 59 that specifies the number of minutes spanned by this <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime>.
trans-unit.target: 指定由此跨裝置填滿的分鐘數的整數值介於 0 到 59 之間<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.TimeSpan%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.TimeSpan%2A> 屬性 (Property)。

trans-unit.source: *seconds*
trans-unit.target: *seconds*

trans-unit.source: A floating-point value between 0 and 59 that specifies the number of seconds spanned by this <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime>.
trans-unit.target: 浮點值介於 0 到 59 之間，指定由此跨裝置填滿的秒數<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.TimeSpan%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.TimeSpan%2A> 屬性 (Property)。

trans-unit.source: *fractionalSeconds*
trans-unit.target: *fractionalSeconds*

trans-unit.source: An integer value consisting of 1 to 7 digits that specifies fractional seconds.
trans-unit.target: 整數值 1 到 7 位數所組成，指定小數秒數。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.TimeSpan%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.TimeSpan%2A> 屬性 (Property)。

trans-unit.source: *pctValue*
trans-unit.target: *pctValue*

trans-unit.source: A floating-point value between 0 and 100, inclusive, that specifies this <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime> as a percentage of the animation's total duration.
trans-unit.target: 浮點值介於 0 到 100 (含)，會指定這<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime>動畫總持續時間的百分比。

trans-unit.source: This should be followed by the literal character `%`.For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.Percent%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這後面必須接著常值字元`%`。如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.Percent%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> structures are equal.
trans-unit.target: 指出兩個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> 結構是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with this instance.
trans-unit.target: 與這個執行個體相互比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this instance equals the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 指出這個執行個體是否等於指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="value" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> that represents the same length of time as this instance; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 是表示與這個執行個體時間長度相同的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Comparing two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime> instances with differently typed <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTimeType> properties, including the special values Uniform or Paced, elicits a false return value.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime>具有執行個體以不同的方式輸入<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTimeType>屬性，包括特殊值統一或 Paced，elicits false 的傳回值。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with this instance.
trans-unit.target: 與這個執行個體相互比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this instance is equal to the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 指出這個執行個體是否等於指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="value" /> is equal to this instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 等於這個執行個體則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The first value to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第一個值。

trans-unit.source: The second value to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第二個值。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the two specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> structures are equal.
trans-unit.target: 表示兩個指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> 結構是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the values of <paramref name="keyTime1" /> and <paramref name="keyTime2" /> are equal; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="keyTime1" /> 和 <paramref name="keyTime2" /> 的值相等，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Comparing two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime> instances with differently typed <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTimeType> properties, including the special values Uniform or Paced, elicits a false return value.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime>具有執行個體以不同的方式輸入<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTimeType>屬性，包括特殊值統一或 Paced，elicits false 的傳回值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> instance, with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTimeType" /> property initialized to the value of the specified parameter.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> 執行個體，其<see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTimeType" /> 屬性初始化為指定的參數值。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> instance, initialized to the value of <paramref name="percent" />.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> 執行個體，初始化為 <paramref name="percent" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: The percent parameter is passed as a double, ranging between the values 0.0 and 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 百分比的參數會傳遞為 double，值介於 0.0 到 1.0 之間的範圍。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="percent" /> is less than 0.0 or greater than 1.0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="percent" /> 小於 0.0 或大於 1.0。

trans-unit.source: The value of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> instance, with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTimeType" /> property initialized to the value of the specified parameter.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> 執行個體，其<see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTimeType" /> 屬性初始化為指定的參數值。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> instance, initialized to the value of <paramref name="timeSpan" />.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> 執行個體，初始化為 <paramref name="timeSpan" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns an integer hash code representing this instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回整數雜湊程式碼，這個雜湊程式碼表示這個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 整數雜湊程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The first value to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第一個值。

trans-unit.source: The second value to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第二個值。

trans-unit.source: Overloaded operator that compares two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> structures for equality.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> 結構是否相等的多載運算子 (Overloaded Operator)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="keyTime1" /> and <paramref name="keyTime2" /> are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="keyTime1" /> 和 <paramref name="keyTime2" /> 相等，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Comparing <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime> instances with differently typed <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTimeType> properties, including the special values Uniform or Paced, elicits a false return value.
trans-unit.target: 比較<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime>具有執行個體以不同的方式輸入<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTimeType>屬性，包括特殊值統一或 Paced，elicits false 的傳回值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.TimeSpan" /> value to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要進行轉換的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.TimeSpan" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Overloaded operator that implicitly converts a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.TimeSpan" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 隱含地將 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.TimeSpan" /> 轉換為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> 的多載運算子。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The first value to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第一個值。

trans-unit.source: The second value to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第二個值。

trans-unit.source: Overloaded operator that compares two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> structures for inequality.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> 結構是否不相等的多載運算子。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="keyTime1" /> and <paramref name="keyTime2" /> are not equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="keyTime1" /> 和 <paramref name="keyTime2" /> 不相等，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.Paced" /> value which creates timing behavior resulting in an animation that interpolates at a constant rate.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.Paced" /> 值，這個值建立的時間行為會導致動畫以常速進行插補。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.Paced" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.Paced" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: When a key time is set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.Paced%2A>, available time is allocated according to the length of each of the key frames to determine the duration of each frame.
trans-unit.target: 當索引鍵時間設定為<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.Paced%2A>，根據每個主要畫面格，以判斷每個畫面格的持續時間的長度配置可用的時間。

trans-unit.source: This will provide the behavior that the "velocity" or pace of the animation will remain constant.
trans-unit.target: 這將提供的行為，"velocity"或動畫的速度將會維持不變。

trans-unit.source: Gets the time when the key frame ends expressed as a percentage of the total duration of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 取得主要畫面格的結束時間，以動畫總持續時間的百分比表示。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.Percent" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.Percent" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: When a key time is expressed as a percentage, the key frame ending time is specified as a percentage of the duration of the key frame animation.
trans-unit.target: 當索引鍵的時間以百分比表示時，主要畫面格結束時間指定的主要畫面格動畫持續時間的百分比。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a key frame animation has a duration of four seconds and 75% is given as the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime> percentage for the key frame, the key frame will end after the 3rd second.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果主要畫面格動畫有 4 秒和 75%的持續時間指定為<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime>主要畫面格的百分比，主要畫面格將會在第 3 秒後結束。

trans-unit.source: If this instance is not of type <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.Percent" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個執行個體不是 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.Percent" /> 型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the time when the key frame ends expressed as a time relative to the beginning of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 取得以動畫開始時間之相對時間表示的主要畫面格結束時間。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.TimeSpan" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.TimeSpan" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: When a key time is expressed as a time span, the key frame ending time is specified as a time relative to the beginning of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 當索引鍵的時間會表示為時間範圍時，主要畫面格結束時間指定為相對於動畫開始時間。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the time span is set to "0:0:2", the key frame will end two seconds after the animation begins.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果時間範圍設定為"0:0:2 」 時，主要畫面格會結束兩秒之後動畫開始。

trans-unit.source: If this instance is not of type <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.TimeSpan" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個執行個體不是 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.TimeSpan" /> 型別。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representing this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回表示這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> 執行個體的字串。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 這個執行個體的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.Type" /> value this instance represents.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個執行個體表示的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.Type" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.Type" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.Type" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.Uniform" /> value which divides the allotted time of the animation evenly between key frames.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.Uniform" /> 值，這個值會在主要畫面格之間平均分佈指定的動畫時間。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.Uniform" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.Uniform" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: When a key time is set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.Uniform%2A>, the total allotted time of the animation is divided evenly between key frames.
trans-unit.target: 當索引鍵時間設定為<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.Uniform%2A>，主要畫面格之間平均分配分配的動畫時間總計。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the key frame animation has a duration of four seconds and there are four key frames, each key frame will last for one second and begin immediately after the preceding one ends.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果主要畫面格動畫的持續時間為 4 秒，而且有四個主要畫面格，每一個主要畫面格將最後一個第二個和前一個結束後，立即開始。
